alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 12:25AM PST until March 05 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...THE WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of two to four inches in the communities of Frazier Park, Pine Mountain Club, and Cuddy Valley. Snowfall of two to three inches along Interstate 5 over Tejon Pass. Additional snow accumulations of one to two inches along Highway 58 over Tehachapi Pass. Winds will gusts as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Tehachapi and Frazier Mountain Communities. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel delays and/or road closures are possible.
info.instruction: If you plan to travel, consider alternate strategies. If you must travel, allow plenty of time to reach your destination. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
